articles.title: April Holidays of DPRK Observed
articles.content:
Past news






April Holidays of DPRK Observed    Pyongyang, April 
13 (KCNA) -- Korean book, photo and handicraft exhibitions opened in Russia, 
Mexico and Ecuador and meetings to remember President Kim Il Sung, seminars, 
round-table talks, film shows and photo exhibitions took place in Egypt and the 
Czech Republic between Apr. 1 and 6 on the occasion of the Day of the Sun and 
the 13th anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il's election as chairman of the 
National Defence Commission of the DPRK. On display in the venues of the 
exhibitions were works of Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il and photos dealing with 
their immortal feats, and books, photos and handicrafts introducing the struggle 
and national wisdom and skills of the Korean people advancing under the uplifted 
banner of Songun.     The attendants of the film shows 
watched Korean films "Fatherly Leader among Officials", "Kim Il Sung Prize 
Laureate Grand Gymnastic and Artistic Performance 'Arirang'", etc. 
    Hasanul Huq Inu, chairman of the Central Executive 
Committee of the Bangladesh National Socialist Party, in a statement issued on 
Apr. 10 on the occasion of the Day of the Sun said that the party would support 
the Korean people in their just cause of building a great prosperous powerful 
nation and achieving the reunification of Korea to the last. 



Protest Letter to Japanese Prime Minister    
Pyongyang, April 13 (KCNA) -- The Swiss Committee for Supporting the Independent 
and Peaceful Reunification of Korea sent a letter of protest to the Japanese 
prime minister on April 5 to denounce the Japanese reactionaries for cracking 
down on the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan (Chongryon). The 
letter recalled that at the instruction of the security department of the Tokyo 
Police Agency, the Osaka Prefectural riot police searched six places including 
the office of the Osaka Prefectural Association of Korean Workers in Commerce in 
Japan, shops owned by Koreans in Japan and their houses in March and the 
Japanese authorities have been engaged in a smear campaign against Chongryon 
over the "abduction issue" already settled. It strongly protested against such 
actions.     The letter went on:     The 
bestial suppression of Chongryon by the Japanese authorities and police is 
undisguised fascist terrorism against all the Koreans in Japan and a 
continuation of the blood-stained history of the Japanese imperialists and 
militarists in which they suppressed and discriminated against the Koreans. 
    This is, at the same time, an act of aggression against 
the DPRK whose citizens are protected by Chongryon.     The 
fascist suppression of Chongryon and Koreans in Japan is an undisguised perfidy 
to the DPRK-Japan Pyongyang Declaration in which the two countries promised to 
normalize their relations and the assurances made by the Japanese prime minister 
that Japan would be friendly toward Chongryon and Koreans in Japan so that they 
may not be exposed to any discrimination.     The Japanese 
government repeated such promise at the talks for the normalization of the 
bilateral relations in February this year.     We demand the 
Japanese government stop at once all the discriminative and terrorist acts 
against Chongryon and Koreans in Japan and honor what it promised to fulfill in 
the DPRK-Japan Pyongyang Declaration.     We express full 
solidarity with Chongryon and Koreans in Japan. 



Japan Urged to Make Official Apology for Drafting "Comfort 
Women"    Pyongyang, April 13 (KCNA) -- A member of the 
House of Representatives from the Democratic Party of the United States of 
America demanded the Japanese government hold itself accountable for the issue 
of "comfort women" for the Japanese Imperial Army and make an official apology 
for it, according to the south Korean Internet radio Voice of People on Apr. 7. 
He said the drafting of "comfort women" for the Japanese Imperial Army committed 
by the Japanese government in the past was the worst human trafficking in the 
20th century and this issue remains a human rights problem at present. The 
Japanese government, he said, gave an underrated and distorted description of 
the issue in textbooks, failing to unveil the whole picture of such a war crime, 
and, as if this is not enough, went the lengths of crossing out the word 
"comfort women" itself last year, he noted, adding: The Japanese government must 
hold itself wholly answerable for the issue and bring the younger generation 
home to it being an anti-human rights crime.     Japan should 
declare that it will never let such crime be committed again and fulfill the 
demand of the United Nations and the international community related to it, he 
urged.     The radio said he laid a resolution to this effect 
before the U.S. congress on Apr. 6. 



Public Presentation of Kim Il Sung's Greatness 
Held    Pyongyang, April 13 (KCNA) -- A public 
presentation of the Ministry of the People's Armed Forces on the greatness of 
President Kim Il Sung took place at the April 25 House of Culture on Wednesday 
on the occasion of the Day of the Sun. Present there were Jo Myong Rok, director 
of the General Political Department of the Korean People's Army, Kim Yong Chun, 
chief of the General Staff of the KPA, leading officials of the ministry and 
servicepersons.     Jo Myong Rok said that Kim Il Sung, 
regarding it as his maxim to believe in the people as in Heaven, put the 
position and dignity of the popular masses on the highest level for the first 
time in history and devoted himself to the work to realize the people's ideal 
and bring them happiness, always mixing with them all his life. 
    Kim Yong Chun said that the army and people of the DPRK 
has firmly defended the gains of revolution while winning victory after victory 
in the confrontation with the United States because Kim Il Sung provided the 
capability for self-defence with his outstanding Songun revolutionary 
leadership.     KPA Generals Pak Jae Gyong and Kim Jong Gak 
made speeches titled "Respected Comrade Kim Il Sung is the great leader who led 
our revolution to victory under the banner of Juche" and "Respected leader 
Comrade Kim Il Sung is the sun of humankind always alive in the hearts of all 
people".     They said that Kim Il Sung, considering 
independence as the life and soul in the whole historic course of leading the 
Korean revolution, shaped the line and all policies our own way and advanced the 
revolution and construction by relying on the strength of the people. 
    They praised him as the world political elder who founded 
the immortal Juche idea indicating the most correct way of hewing out the 
destiny of the popular masses and made undying contributions to accomplishing 
the human cause of independence. They called upon all the servicepersons of the 
KPA to eternally hold him in high esteem as the sun of Juche, accelerate the 
building of a great prosperous powerful socialist nation and wage a dynamic 
struggle for the national reunification and final victory of the revolutionary 
cause of Juche, tightly holding arms of revolution under the Songun 
revolutionary leadership of Supreme Commander Kim Jong Il. 



National Student Basketball Games Held    
Phyongsong, April 12 (KCNA) -- National student basketball games commemorating 
the Day of the Sun took place in Phyongsong from Apr. 4 to 11. Competing in the 
games were men and women cagers of 20 odd teams which had proved successful in 
the preliminaries in the university and college groups. In the games among 
university teams the men's team of Kim Hyong Jik University of Education and the 
women's team of Hamhung Teacher Training University No. 2 finished the winners. 
In the games among college teams the men's team of 
Hamhung Statistics College and the women's team of Sinuiju Financial Economy 
College emerged supreme. The teams and players that shared honors in the games 
were awarded citations, medals and prizes. 



Vowing Meetings of Workers and Peasants Held    
Pyongyang, April 13 (KCNA) -- Workers, union members and agricultural workers 
held vowing meetings respectively before the statues of President Kim Il Sung on 
Mansu Hill of Pyongyang and in Chongsan-ri, Kangso County, South Phyongan 
Province on Apr. 12 on the occasion of the Day of the Sun. The reporter and 
speakers at a vowing meeting of workers and union members called for launching 
an overall powerful offensive for a new leap forward in the building of a great 
prosperous powerful socialist nation to contribute to strengthening national 
defence power as required by the economic construction line of the Workers' 
Party of Korea in the Songun era and bringing about a new revolutionary 
improvement at all working sites.     They called for holding 
the President in high esteem for all ages and dynamically striving to accomplish 
the revolutionary cause of Juche under the leadership of Kim Jong Il, brilliant 
commander of Songun of Mt. Paektu.     Kim Jung Rin, 
secretary of the C.C., the WPK, was present at the meeting. The participants in 
the vowing meeting of agricultural workers firmly made an oath to bring about an 
epochal turn in agricultural production true to the behests of the President at 
the call of Kang Chang Uk, chairman of the C.C., the Union of Agricultural 
Workers of Korea.     They called upon all agricultural 
workers to give full play to the revolutionary soldier spirit in implementing 
the party policy of agricultural revolution true to the behests of the President 
that "Rice precisely means socialism", speed up the land realignment and 
waterway projects and do farming well this year to carry through the intention 
and resolution of the Party to settle the food problem sufficiently. 



Reception Given by Cuban Ambassador    Pyongyang, 
April 13 (KCNA) -- Ruben Perez Valdes, Cuban ambassador to the DPRK, gave a 
reception on Wednesday on the occasion of the Day of the Sun. Present on 
invitation were Yang Hyong Sop, vice-president of the Presidium of the Supreme 
People's Assembly, Ro Tu Chol, vice-premier of the Cabinet, and other officials 
concerned. On hand were staff members of the Cuban embassy. The ambassador said 
that President Kim Il Sung is the great man who devoted his all to carrying out 
the Korean revolution and the cause of global independence and developing the 
friendly relations between Cuba and the DPRK. The Cuban people are boundlessly 
revering him, the ambassador noted.     The Cuba-DPRK 
relations have a long historic root, he said, stating that the friendly 
relations provided by Fidel Castro Ruz and Kim Il Sung are steadily developing 
day by day under the deep concern of the top leaders of the two countries. He 
stressed that the Cuban people will make every possible effort to boost the 
friendly and cooperative relations between the two countries as bequeathed by 
Kim Il Sung. Yang Hyong Sop, speaking next, said that the Cuban friends' joining 
the Korean people in commemorating the significant Day of the Sun is an 
expression of deep reverence of the Cuban party, government and people for Kim 
Il Sung.     In the period when the moves of the U.S. 
imperialists to stifle Cuba were utterly unscrupulous, Kim Il Sung took positive 
steps to defend the Cuban revolution and helped the Cuban people both materially 
and morally in their socialist construction, he noted.     
The revolutionary cause of Juche started by Kim Il Sung is being successfully 
carried forward and accomplished by leader Kim Jong Il, he said, stressing that 
they would actively strive to consolidate and develop the friendly and 
cooperative relations between the DPRK and Cuba. 



U.S. Preparations for Preemptive Nuclear Attack upon DPRK under 
Fire    Pyongyang, April 13 (KCNA) -- The Bush hard-line 
conservative forces have become frantic in their moves to push forward the 
establishment of the missile defence system (MD) and the modernization of 
nuclear weapons under the signboard of "security" and "defense". In this regard 
Rodong Sinmun today in a signed commentary says that this poses a big threat to 
the global peace and security and touches off uneasiness among people. The 
commentary goes on:     As the world public rightly put it, 
the U.S. bellicose forces' hue and cry over the "military threat" from someone 
is no more than a poor excuse. The "defense" of the U.S. mainland much touted by 
them is, in essence, nothing but a theory of aggression which calls for bringing 
down the anti-imperialist independent countries and putting the world under 
their control. The Bush administration's listing of the DPRK as part of an "axis 
of evil", a target of its preemptive nuclear attack is little short of a 
declaration of a war to mount a preemptive nuclear attack upon the DPRK. 
 The Bush forces' frantic pursuance of their hostile 
policy toward the DPRK would only compel it to further bolster its nuclear 
deterrent for self-defence. It is the Korean people's way of counter-action to 
respond to dialogue with dialogue and war with war. The DPRK's possession of 
nuclear weapons is for self-defence from A to Z and serves as a powerful shield 
to defend peace. The U.S. should not misuse the DPRK's measure to bolster its 
nuclear deterrent for self-defence as a lever for achieving its aggressive 
purpose.     The U.S. is free to let loose all sorts of 
vituperation against the DPRK in a bid to achieve its sinister political and 
military purpose. This, however, will get it nowhere. The U.S. would be well 
advised to ponder over the consequences to be entailed by its evermore 
undisguised policy of aggression and behave with discretion. 



Gift to Kim Jong Il from Swiss Organization    
Pyongyang, April 13 (KCNA) -- Leader Kim Jong Il received a gift from the SGS of 
Switzerland. George Bottomley, head of the SGS delegation on a visit to the 
DPRK, conveyed it to an official concerned on April 12. 



Anniversary of Kim Jong Il's Work Marked    
Pyongyang, April 13 (KCNA) -- Rodong Sinmun today dedicates an article to the 
32nd anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il's famous work "Let Us More Thoroughly 
Establish the Monolithic Ideological System in the Whole Party and Society." Kim 
Jong Il in the work published on April 14, Juche 63 (1974) comprehensively deals 
with the principled issues in more thoroughly establishing the monolithic 
ideological system of the Party to meet the requirements for modeling the whole 
society on the Juche idea.     Recalling that he has 
energetically led the drive to cement as firm as a rock the single-minded unity 
of the whole Party and society around President Kim Il Sung, guided by his 
revolutionary idea, the article goes on:     The work to 
establish the monolithic ideological system of the Party has gained in depth and 
the tradition of unity established in Mt. Paektu has been successfully carried 
forward under the leadership of Kim Jong Il. As a result, all the servicepersons 
and people of the DPRK are single-mindedly united around the Party and the 
leader in thinking and purpose and on the basis of comradeship, guided by the 
revolutionary idea of the President, and sharing the destiny with them. 
    It is the undying feat performed by Kim Jong Il that he 
consolidated the Party's organizational and ideological foundation for 
succeeding to the cause of the President, foreseeing the future of the Korean 
revolution and the cause of independence with his extraordinary ideological and 
theoretical wisdom and far-sightedness. The last one decade occupies a special 
place in Kim Jong Il's history of revolutionary activities for carrying forward 
and accomplishing the revolutionary cause of the President. 
    Kim Jong Il led the "Arduous March," the forced march to 
victory with his unique Songun revolutionary line, the Songun political mode, 
defending the lifeline of the cause of Juche and glorifying the ever-victorious 
history of the Korean revolution generation after generation. This immortal 
history of Songun revolution will shine forever. The immortal feats Kim Jong Il 
has performed in the struggle to accomplish the revolutionary cause of the 
President lie in that he has steadily developed and enriched the President's 
revolutionary idea, the Juche idea as required by the developing revolution. 
    Kim Jong Il has provided wise guidance over the work to 
successfully accomplish the revolutionary cause of the President. He has 
judiciously steered the work to consolidate the single-minded unity of the 
revolutionary ranks based on the revolutionary idea of the President and the 
drive to implement his behests to the letter, laying a firm foundation for the 
building of a great prosperous powerful nation. Our army and people will surely 
accomplish the revolutionary cause of the President, holding aloft the banner of 
Songun under the revolutionary steermanship of Kim Jong Il. 



Performances of ASFAF Successfully Go on    
Pyongyang, April 13 (KCNA) -- Performances of the 24th April Spring Friendship 
Art Festival (ASFAF) are going on at different theatres here, drawing capacity 
audiences. Put on the stages were colorful numbers spiced with rich national 
flavor, diverse in contents and peculiar in style.     
Artistes of the Moscow State Academy Symphony Orchestra of Russia 
internationally recognized as a prestigious art troupe made up of famous 
artistes including people's artistes and merited artistes successfully presented 
the fourth movement "Glory to General Kim Jong Il" of the symphony suite "Long 
Journey for Songun Leadership." A baritone of the Kazakhstan famous artistes' 
troupe who is international concours winner impressively sang the Korean song 
"Red Snow Falls from the Sky above the City of Iron" with his rich voice. 
    A tenor of the Vietnamese artistes' troupe who is 
international concours winner presented the Korean song "Soldiers Live Near the 
General" successfully representing the KPA servicepersons' high honor and pride 
of holding Kim Jong Il as its supreme commander, deeply impressing the audience. 
    The Polish troupe of famous artistes consisting of 
international concours winners put on the stage a male solo "Dreadful Yard" and 
a female solo "Picture without You". Dancers of the Kiev Dancing Theatre of 
Ukraine, which participated in the ASFAF several times and received group prize, 
gold prize and silver prize, staged colorful numbers.     The 
Chinese instrumentalists, who successfully performed traditional music pieces, 
pleasing leader Kim Jong Il during his visit to China in January, presented them 
again this time to be highly acclaimed by the audience for their refined and 
delicate rendition and high artistry.     The fourth movement 
"We Pledge" of the symphony "Leader Will Be Always with Us" conducted by Ri Jun 
Mu, head of the troupe of Korean artistes in the U.S. impressively represented 
the iron-will of the Korean people to accomplish the revolutionary cause of 
Juche started by President Kim Il Sung.     Choe Kyong Ho, 
popular singer of the troupe of Korean artistes in China, presented a song 
"Reverence for General" in which he truthfully represented unbounded veneration 
and ardent desire of the progressive people in our times who highly praise and 
follow Kim Jong Il as a great man born of Heaven and an ever-victorious Songun 
brilliant commander.     Performances continue amid the 
strong longing and reverence for the President. 



Floral Baskets Laid before Statue of Kim Il Sung    
Pyongyang, April 13 (KCNA) -- The economic and commercial councilors corps and 
officials in charge of cultural and friendly relations of foreign embassies here 
laid floral baskets before the statue of President Kim Il Sung on Mansu Hill on 
April 13 on the occasion of the Day of the Sun. And they made a bow to him in 
humble reverence. 



Kim Yong Nam Meets Russian Guests    Pyongyang, 
April 13 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme 
People's Assembly, met and had a conversation with a delegation of the Russian 
International Charity Fund "Protectors of Arts for the Century" headed by its 
President Oleg Oleinik at the Mansudae Assembly Hall today. Present there were 
Kim Jin Song, minister of Culture, Mun Jae Chol, acting chairman of the Korean 
Committee for Cultural Relations with Foreign Countries, Kung Sok Ung, 
vice-minister of Foreign Affairs, and others and Andrei Karlov, Russian 
ambassador to the DPRK. The head of the delegation extended thanks to leader Kim 
Jong Il for having made a great contribution to the development of cultural 
exchange between Russia and the DPRK, noting that he has been deeply respected 
by the people of the world. 



Pyongyang in Festive Mood    Pyongyang, April 13 
(KCNA) -- Pyongyang is decked in festive attire to meet the Day of the Sun, the 
birthday of President Kim Il Sung (April 15). The Korean people, with a 
reverence for him, are commemorating the Day of the Sun as a greatest holiday of 
the nation.     Fluttering on flag poles in streets, 
residential quarters and working sites are flags of the Workers' Party of Korea, 
the DPRK and the April Spring Friendship Art Festival. And posters, streamers 
and decorations commemorating the holiday have been set up in different parts of 
the city, making the festive attire more jubilant. Servicepersons, working 
people of all strata, school youth and children are visiting the Kumsusan 
Memorial Palace where the President lies in state, Mangyongdae, the cradle of 
revolution, and revolutionary sites associated with his immortal revolutionary 
exploits.     Colorful functions including meetings to 
remember the President, seminars, exhibitions, lecture meetings and artistic 
performances are organized in praise of his greatness.     
The 24th April Spring Friendship Art Festival was opened on Monday. A lot of 
famous art troupes and artistes from foreign countries and regions across the 
world give performances high in ideological content and artistic value, adding 
lustre to the holiday.     The 8th Kimilsungia Festival is 
going on before full houses on the occasion of the jubilee. 
    The 19th International Marathon Race for Mangyongdae Cup 
took place amid a great interest of people on April 9.     
The fun fairs in different places of the city which started their operation on 
this occasion are crowded with working people, school youth and children. 
Various kinds of flower plants are opening flowers, converting Pyongyang into a 
flower garden as if they reflect the desire of the people to attend the 
President among flowers. 



Moscow State Symphony Orchestra Gives Successful 
Performances    Pyongyang, April 13 (KCNA) -- Many 
world-famous art troupes are participating in the 24th April Spring Friendship 
Art Festival which is going on in Pyongyang before full houses on the occasion 
of the Day of the Sun. Among them is the Moscow State Symphony Orchestra, which 
gives performances at the People's Palace of Culture. It puts on stage the 
various programs including "Concert for Orchestra" composed by Bartok. It well 
depicts the concert which demands high playing technique and well-arranged 
ensemble.     It also performs the "Glory to the General," 
the fourth movement of the Korean symphonic suite "Long Trip for Army-based 
Leadership", which it has specially prepared, to delight the audience 
commemorating the Day of the Sun. The Moscow State Symphony Orchestra, which was 
formed during the Second World War, is made up with competent conductors and 
players with high level of playing technique.     Head and 
Chief Conductor of the orchestra Pavel Kogan is the People's Artiste of the 
Russian Federation, winner of the National Prize of the Russian Federation, 
international concours winner and a full member of the Russian Academy of Arts. 
The orchestra has participated in the world art festivals on behalf of Russia 
and made its performances in more than 70 countries including Germany, France 
and Switzerland, earning fame. 



Title of Generalissimo Shining with Army Leadership 
Exploits    Pyongyang, April 13 (KCNA) -- President Kim 
Il Sung was awarded the title of generalissimo on April 13, Juche 81 (1992). The 
title is associated with the immortal exploits performed by the President who 
wrought military miracles in the 20th century.     He, who 
embarked on the road of revolution in his early years, founded the first 
revolutionary armed forces in Korea with the two pistols handed down by his 
father as wherewithal and declared a war against the one million-strong troops 
of the Japanese imperialists.     He fought the anti-Japanese 
war in the many-folded difficult conditions beyond imagination without any 
stable rear and modern military hardware. He, however, defeated the Japanese 
imperialists with protean and superb war tactics such as the "Art of Shrinking 
the Earth" and the "march tactic one thousand miles at a run" to bring the joy 
of liberation to the Korean people.     The U.S. imperialists 
started the three year-long Korean war to overthrow the young Democratic 
People's Republic of Korea in its cradle by mobilizing troops of its 15 
satellite countries. He also defeated the enemies which were superior in 
numerical strength and military technique with his extraordinary military 
strategy and unique war tactics unheard-of in the world history of wars and won 
the great victory in the Fatherland Liberation War.     The 
President had strengthened the Korean People's Army as an invincible 
revolutionary army to beat back any formidable enemy at one stroke and 
consistently increased the defence capacity of the country to convert the whole 
country into an impregnable fortress. He thus frustrated the persistent new war 
provocation moves of the U.S. imperialists and reliably defended the security of 
the country and the people. It was a long-cherished desire of the Korean people 
to award the title of generalissimo to the President who led the two 
revolutionary wars to victory in one generation to promote the prestige and 
glory of the DPRK and laid a solid foundation to firmly guarantee the 
revolutionary cause of Juche with arms. 



Russian Delegation Arrives    Pyongyang, April 13 
(KCNA) -- A delegation of the Russian Youth Association for the Study of the 
Songun Policy led by its Chairman Mikhail Panchenko arrived here today. 



Gift to Kim Jong Il from Mongolian Delegation    
Pyongyang, April 13 (KCNA) -- Leader Kim Jong Il was presented with a gift by 
the Mongolian delegation for commemorating the Day of the Sun on a visit to the 
DPRK. The gift was handed to an official concerned by B. Baigalmaa, executive 
chairman of the Mongolia-Korea Friendship Society who is leading the delegation. 




KPA Servicepersons' Solemn Oath-Taking Ceremony 
Held    Pyongyang, April 13 (KCNA) -- A solemn ceremony 
of servicepersons of the three services of the Korean People's Army took place 
at the square of the Kumsusan Memorial Palace on April 13 to pay high tribute to 
President Kim Il Sung and vow loyalty to Supreme Commander Kim Jong Il on the 
occasion of the Day of the Sun. All the participants respectfully made a salute 
towards the portrait of the President. KPA Vice Marshal Jo Myong Rok, director 
of the General Political Department of the KPA, said in a speech that all the 
servicepersons of the three services of the KPA pay highest tribute and offer 
eternal glory to the President on the significant occasion of the Day of the 
Sun.     He noted that they would always uphold and follow 
with loyalty Kim Jong Il who is the great defender of the country and the nation 
and serves as a banner of all victories and glory and devotedly defend the 
headquarters of the revolution led by him just as the O Jung Hup-led 7th 
Regiment did.     The KPA will firmly equip itself with a 
Juche-oriented view on war and round off the preparations to go into action as 
required by the situation of the revolution where the U.S. imperialists have 
become evermore undisguised in their moves to stifle the DPRK so as to implement 
the last instructions of the President for national reunification without fail, 
he noted.     All the participants made a firm pledge to 
fully ensure the victory in the revolutionary cause of Juche with the invincible 
military force under the Songun revolutionary leadership of Kim Jong Il, firmly 
convinced that they would always emerge victorious as long as they are led by 
him.     They loudly shouted revolutionary and militant 
slogans including "Kim Jong Il" and "devoted defence" and sang in chorus song 
"We Will Defend the Headquarters of the Revolution with Our Lives". 
    Then followed a march past of the servicepersons. 
    Among those present there were KPA Vice Marshal Kim Yong 
Chun, chief of the KPA General Staff, KPA Marshal Ri Ul Sol, KPA Vice Marshals 
Kim Ik Hyon, Ri Jong San, Pak Ki So, Kim Ryong Yon and Ri Ha Il and leading 
officials the Ministry of the People's Armed Forces. 



Remains of More Martyrs Buried    Pyongyang, April 
13 (KCNA) -- Remains of more martyrs who performed feats in the sacred struggle 
for the prosperity and development of the country and the victory of the 
socialist cause were buried in the Patriotic Martyrs Cemetery. Among them were 
former General Officers of the Korean People's Army Choe Hyong Gwan, Ri Tong Ho 
and Ri Se Hwan, former Secretary General of the Presidium of the Supreme 
People's Assembly Kim Yun Hyok, former Vice Department Director of the Central 
Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea Mun Myong On and former KPA officer 
Hyon Ju Yong.     They also included Candidate Academician 
and Professor Jong Ryol Mo who was an anti-Japanese patriotic martyr and 
researcher at the Academy of Social Sciences, former Presidium Member of the 
C.C., the Democratic Front for the Reunification of the Fatherland Jong Tu Hwan, 
former Councilor of the C.C., the Korean Social Democratic Party Song Se Chang, 
Academician, Professor and Doctor Kim Si Jung, former Advisory Teacher at Kim Il 
Sung Higher Party School, People's Artiste Choe Chang Un, former advisor to the 
KPA Song and Dance Ensemble, and People's Artist Ho Kum Jong, former composer at 
the Mansudae Art Troupe.     Burial ceremonies were held on 
Apr. 12 and 13.     Present there were Kim Ki Nam, secretary 
of the C.C., the WPK, Song Yong Su, deputy director of the History Institute of 
the C.C., the WPK, officials concerned and bereaved families. 
    The attendants laid wreaths and bouquets before the 
graves of the martyrs before observing a moment's silence in memory of them. 



Kim Il Sung Awarded Order "Gold Star of Protector of 
Arts"    Pyongyang, April 13 (KCNA) -- President Kim Il 
Sung was awarded order "Gold Star of Protector of Arts", the highest 
commendation of the Russian International Charity Fund "Protectors of Arts for 
the Century." A ceremony of conveying the order took place at the Mansudae 
Assembly Hall today. Present there were Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium 
of the Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK, Kim Jin Song, minister of Culture, 
Mun Jae Chol, acting chairman of the Korean Committee for Cultural Relations 
with Foreign Countries, Kung Sok Ung, vice-minister of Foreign Affairs, and 
others.     On hand were members of the visiting delegation 
of the fund headed by its President Oleg Oleinik and Andrei Karlov, Russian 
ambassador to the DPRK. Yuri Kovelenov, chairman of the Experts Council of the 
fund, in his speech said that the world people respect Kim Il Sung as the most 
prominent statesman as he made a great contribution to the accomplishment of 
progressive mankind's cause of independence.     Speaking 
next, its President Oleg Oleinik said that they had the honor of conveying the 
jeweled order "Gold Star of Protector of Arts" conferred upon Kim Il Sung, the 
great leader and eternal President of the DPRK, on behalf of the Steering 
Council of the fund, adding that this is in high recognition of the undying 
exploits performed by Kim Il Sung. The order and its certificate, "Gold Knife of 
Protector of Arts" and "Good-Natured Angel", a statuette symbolic of protectors 
of arts of the century were conveyed to Kim Yong Nam at the ceremony. 



Kimilsungia Festival Opens    Pyongyang, April 13 
(KCNA) -- The 8th Kimilsungia Festival was opened here in a grand style. On 
display in the venue of the festival are lots of potted Kimilsungias, the flower 
of the sun, cultivated by military organs, the commissions and ministries of the 
Cabinet, national institutions, Pyongyang Municipality, servicepersons, working 
people, school youth and children, foreign embassies here, friendship 
organizations, public organizations and individuals of foreign countries, 
overseas Koreans and Chinese residents in the DPRK.     An 
opening ceremony took place at the Kimilsungia-Kimjongilia Exhibition on 
Thursday.     Present there were Choe Thae Bok, Yang Hyong 
Sop and Kwak Pom Gi, members of the Cabinet, leading officials of the 
ministries, national institutions and working people's organizations, officials 
concerned, servicepersons, working people and school youth and children. 
    Also present there were the Indonesian cultural 
delegation, the delegation of Koreans in Japan and other delegations of overseas 
Koreans, the delegation of the Japanese Society for Loving Kimjongilia, foreign 
and regional delegations and delegates of the Society for Supporting the 
Propagation of the Immortal Flower and staff members of the Indonesian embassy 
here.     Kang Nung Su, chairman of the Korean 
Kimilsungia-Kimjongilia Committee, in an opening address said that the current 
festival is of greater significance as it is open on the occasion of the first 
anniversary of "Kimilsungia Is an Immortal Flower Blooming in the Hearts of 
Humankind in the Era of Independence", a famous work of leader Kim Jong Il 
possessed of the noblest sense of moral obligation towards President Kim Il 
Sung.     He said that the army and people of the DPRK would 
make the festival a festival of flowers praising the President boundlessly 
revered by all people as a great man, a grand political festival which will 
demonstrate the spirit of all the servicepersons and people dynamically 
advancing to reach a high eminence of a great prosperous powerful nation under 
the Songun leadership of Kim Jong Il.     He stressed the 
need to boost the exchange and cooperation in cultivating and propagating 
Kimilsungia and thus bring the flower of the sun into fuller bloom in Korea and 
various other countries.     Director General of the Ministry 
of Culture and Tourism of Indonesia Sri Hastanto who is heading the Indonesian 
cultural delegation made a congratulatory speech. He said that the event in 
which President Sukarno named a newly bred flower Kimilsungia and presented it 
to President Kim Il Sung as a gift during his visit to Indonesia is always 
remembered by the peoples of the two countries. He expressed the conviction that 
the bilateral friendly relations would grow stronger in the future. 
    At the end of the opening ceremony its participants went 
round the festival. 



Kim Jong Il Inspects KPA Navy Unit    Pyongyang, 
April 13 (KCNA) -- Supreme Commander of the Korean People's Army Kim Jong Il, 
general secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea and chairman of the National 
Defence Commission of the DPRK, inspected Unit 406 of the KPA Navy. Conducted by 
the commander of the unit, he went round the monument to the on-the-spot 
guidance of President Kim Il Sung, the room for the education in the 
revolutionary history and the room dedicated to the history of the unit. Thanks 
to the wise leadership and meticulous care of Kim Il Sung who exerted all 
efforts for the founding of the naval force and worked heart and soul for its 
strengthening and development till the last moments of his life, the navy of the 
DPRK has grown to be a matchless force, he said, noting that the undying 
revolutionary feats performed by Kim Il Sung in the Juche-based navy building 
will shine long in the annals of the country.     After 
acquainting himself with the unit's performance of duty, he expressed great 
satisfaction over the fact that its servicepersons have turned their naval port 
into an impregnable fortress to beat back any surprise invasion of the U.S. 
imperialist aggressors in time and prepared themselves to be navy men who 
cherish the spirit of devotedly defending the leader, the spirit of becoming 
human bullets and bombs and the self-blasting spirit as their unshakable faith. 
    Then he took deep care of the living of the seamen, going 
round the entertainment and educational and supply service facilities of the 
unit.     No details escaped him, ranging from beds for 
seamen to processing, storing and taking care of non-staple food and their 
tastes. He appreciated the efforts made by the commanding officers of the unit, 
pleased to learn that they have provided the servicepersons with good living 
conditions, bearing in mind the teaching of the President that supply service 
precisely means a political work. Calling for paying special attention to the 
living of the seamen as they live in a rough sea in all seasons, he stressed the 
need for all the commanding officers to show warm love for the soldiers and take 
care of them as their real parents would do so that they may not feel any 
slightest inconvenience in their living.     He enjoyed an 
art performance given by seamen.     He had a picture taken 
with them.     He also inspected a sub-unit of the unit. 
    He acquainted himself with its servicepersons' 
performance of duty before watching them in training.     He 
underscored the need for the servicepersons to put the training on a scientific 
and fruitful basis, saying that only when they undergo an effective combat 
training can they acquire peculiar and superb tactics, high marksmanship and 
specialized military technique.     Then he went round an 
education room, a bedroom, a mess hall, a wash-cum-bath house, a barber's, a 
daily provision store and various other places of the sub-unit. He gave its 
servicepersons a pair of binoculars and an automatic rifle as gifts and had a 
photo session with them.     He was accompanied by KPA 
Generals Ri Myong Su, Hyon Chol Hae and Pak Jae Gyong and Vice Department 
Director of the Central Committee of the WPK Hwang Pyong So.

Rodong Sinmun denuncia maniobras de ataque preventivo de 
EE.UU.    Pyongyang, 13 de abril (ATCC) -- Las fuerzas 
conservadoras intransigentes de Bush impulsan el establecimiento del sistema 
antimisiles y la modernizacion de las armas nucleares so pretexto de la 
"seguridad" y la "defensa", lo cual constituye una gran amenaza a la paz y la 
seguridad del mundo y causa preocupacion de los pueblos. Asi senala el periodico 
Rodong Sinmun en un comentario individual del dia 13 y continua: 
    Como califica justamente el mundo, la "amenaza militar" 
de alguien, de que hablan los maniacos yanquis de guerra, no pasa de ser un 
absurdo pretexto. La "defensa" del territorio norteamericano a que se refieren 
ellos es, en su esencia, la teoria de agresion para eliminar a los paises 
independientes antiimperialistas y tomar una hegemonia militar en el globo 
terraqueo.     La administracion Bush definio a la Republica 
Popular Democratica de Corea como "eje del mal" y blanco de primer ataque 
nuclear. Esto constituye precisamente la declaracion de guerra para darle el 
ataque preventivo nuclear. Si el poder de Bush se recurre como ahora a la 
politica hostil a la RPDC, esta se vera obligada a tomar el camino para 
fortalecer mas la fuerza de detencion nuclear autodefensiva. Responder con el 
dialogo al dialogo y con la guerra a la guerra es el modo de enfrentamiento del 
pueblo coreano.     La posesion de las armas nucleares de 
Corea es para la autodefensa y un potente escudo para preservar la paz. EE.UU. 
no debe aprovechar tales medidas de autodefensa como palanca para lograr su 
objeto agresivo.     El imperio acusa a la RPDC a fin de 
alcanzar su malsano objeto politico y militar, pero, no lo realizara jamas. 
    EE.UU. debe reflexionar de las consecuencias que emanen 
del fortalecimiento de la politica de agresion contra la RPDC y actuar con 
prudencia. 



Embajador cubano ofrece una recepcion por el Dia del 
Sol   �@Pyongyang, 13 de abril (ATCC) -- El embajador 
extraordinario y plenipotenciario de la Republica de Cuba en Corea, Ruben Perez 
Valdes, ofrecio el dia 12 una recepcion en ocasion del Dia del Sol (15 de abril, 
cumpleanos del Presidente Kim Il Sung). Fueron invitados Yang Hyong Sop, 
vicepresidente del Presidium de la Asamblea Popular Suprema, Ro Tu Chol, 
vicepremier del Consejo de Ministros, y otros funcionarios coreanos. 
    Tambien estuvieron presentes los miembros de la sede 
diplomatica cubana. Al hacer uso de la palabra, el embajador cubano dijo que el 
Presidente Kim Il Sung es el gran hombre quien dedico todo lo suyo en aras de la 
Revolucion Coreana, el cumplimiento de la causa de la independencia del mundo y 
el desarrollo de las relaciones de amistad entre Cuba y Corea y anadio que es 
respetado infinitamente por el pueblo cubano.     Prosiguio 
que las relaciones bilaterales tienen raices historicas y destaco que hoy dia, 
los vinculos de amistad preparados por el companero Fidel Castro Ruz y el 
Presidente Kim Il Sung se fortalecen y se desarrollan cada dia mas bajo la 
profunda atencion de los maximos dirigentes de los dos paises. 
    Subrayo que el pueblo cubano hara ingentes esfuerzos por 
ensanchar las relaciones de amistad y cooperacion entre los dos paises de 
acuerdo con el legado del Presidente Kim Il Sung.     Le 
siguio en intervenir Yang Hyong Sop quien senalo que los amigos cubanos 
conmemoran con el pueblo coreano el muy significativo Dia del Sol, lo cual 
constituye un testimonio de la alta consideracion del partido y el gobierno de 
Cuba hacia el Presidente Kim Il Sung.     Recordo que cuando 
se tornaban mas brutales las maniobras de los imperialistas norteamericanos para 
aplastar a Cuba, el Presidente adopto activamente medidas para salvaguardar la 
Revolucion Cubana y ayudar en lo material y espiritual la construccion del 
socialismo del pueblo cubano.     La causa revolucionaria del 
Juche, iniciada por el, la lleva adelante el Dirigente Kim Jong Il, destaco el 
orador y ratifico que Corea se esforzara activamente por consolidar y 
desarrollar las relaciones de amistad y cooperacion con Cuba.

Simposio del MINFAP sobre gran personalidad de Kim Il 
Sung    Pyongyang, 13 de abril (ATCC) -- En ocasion del 
Dia del Sol (15 de abril, cumpleanos del Presidente Kim Il Sung), tuvo lugar el 
dia 12 en la capitalina Casa Cultural 25 de Abril un simposio del Ministerio de 
las Fuerzas Armadas Populares (MINFAP) sobre la gran personalidad del Presidente 
Kim Il Sung. Participaron en la ocasion Jo Myong Rok, jefe de la Direccion 
Politica General del Ejercito Popular de Corea, Kim Yong Chun, jefe del Estado 
Mayor General del EPC y otros cuadros directivos del MINFAP, oficiales y 
soldados.     Jo Myong Rok dijo que el Presidente, al tomar 
como maxima Iminwichon (idea de considerar al pueblo como cielo), hizo situar 
por primera vez en la historia en el nivel supremo la posicion y la dignidad de 
las masas populares y dedico todo lo suyo a la realizacion del ideal y la 
felicidad del pueblo tomando en toda su vida el "tren hacia el pueblo". 
    �@Kim Yong Chun senalo que gracias al poderio 
autodefensivo preparado por la direccion del Presidente sobre la revolucion 
mediante el Songun (priorizacion militar), el ejercito y el pueblo de Corea 
pudieron lograr victoria tras victoria en la confrontacion con los yanquis y 
defender firmemente las conquistas de la revolucion. A continuacion, los 
generales de ejercito del EPC Pak Jae Gyong y Kim Jong Gak intervinieron con los 
temas: "El estimado camarada Kim Il Sung es el gran Lider quien condujo por el 
camino del triunfo la revolucion coreana bajo la bandera del Juche" y "El 
estimado lider, camarada Kim Il Sung es el Sol de la humanidad que vivira 
siempre en el corazon de todos los pueblos".     Los oradores 
dijeron que en el proceso historico de la direccion de la Revolucion Coreana el 
Presidente presento como vida la independencia, trazo a nuestra manera todas las 
lineas y politicas y llevo adelante la revolucion y la construccion apoyandose 
en las fuerzas del pueblo.     Elogiaron al Presidente como 
veterano de la politica mundial que al crear la inmortal idea Juche ilumino el 
camino mas correcto de la forja del destino de las masas populares e hizo aporte 
inmortal al cumplimiento de la causa de independencia de la humanidad. 
Enfatizaron que todos los oficiales y soldados del EPC deben enaltecer 
eternamente al Presidente como Sol del Juche, tomar firmemente el fusil de la 
revolucion bajo la direccion del Comandante Supremo Kim Jong Il sobre la 
revolucion mediante el Songun y luchar tenazmente por construir lo mas pronto 
posible una gran potencia socialista prospera y lograr la reunificacion de la 
patria y el triunfo final de la causa revolucionaria del Juche.
